name: @architect/parser
description: Architect Parser accepts plaintext, JSON, or YAML .arc manifests and returns a plain JavaScript Object

scripts.deno:fmt: deno fmt mod.ts && deno fmt mod.test.ts
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run coverage
scripts.vendor:js-yaml: mkdir -p tmp && browserify --node --standalone js-yaml --im --no-builtins node_modules/js-yaml/index.js > tmp/js-yaml.js && mkdir -p src/compat/vendor && terser tmp/js-yaml.js -o src/compat/vendor/js-yaml.min.js

author: Brian LeRoux
